metadata.title: CVE-2024-24860 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's bluetooth device driver in{min,max}_key_size_set() function. This can result in a null pointerdereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of serviceissue.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
